Wonder.

Presenting Illuminadi: The Premier Magician and Mentalist for Hire in Nashville!


In this moment brimming with hidden wonders, let Illuminadi be your guide. With joyful curiosity, he reveals the invisible bonds that connect us all. Prepare to embark on an extraordinary journey filled with mind-blowing magic, interactive illusions, and unforgettable experiences.

About the Shows
About the Shows

Spectacular Shows

Illuminadi is a modern showman whose performances have been hailed as “engaging, emotionally moving, and truly unique.” With his mesmerizing stage presence and jaw-dropping tricks, he captivates audiences in Nashville and leaves them in awe. Having performed at esteemed venues such as The World Famous Magic Castle in Los Angeles, The historic Franklin Theatre, and the House of Cards in downtown Nashville, Illuminadi’s show is guaranteed to exceed your expectations.

Pick a card. Any card.

Close-Up

The intimate art of producing astonishing illusions within close proximity to the audience.

Parlor

The extravagant art of creating larger than life illusions that can amaze from afar.

Stage

The cerebral art of utilizing human psychology and body language to provide unexplainable magical experiences

Corporate Events

Looking to add a touch of enchantment and wonder to your corporate event? Illuminadi specializes in creating magical experiences that leave a lasting impact. Elevate your corporate event with astonishing magic. 

Learn about Corporate Events

Meet Illuminadi

Before embracing his life as a magician, Illuminadi pursued a career as a pharmacist. This unique background allows him to blend the art of magic with the science behind it, creating a one-of-a-kind experience. As a magician member of the esteemed Academy of Magical Arts and a performer at renowned venues, including The World Famous Magic Castle and House of Cards, Illuminadi’s expertise and professionalism are unmatched.
